name: Celtic Cross
description: The most comprehensive 10-card spread for deep insight into any situation

timeline.description: Optional timeline cards for additional perspective

positions.label: Present Situation
positions.description: The heart of your current situation

positions.label: Challenge/Cross
positions.description: What crosses you - the challenge or obstacle

positions.label: Distant Past
positions.description: Foundation - what this is based on

positions.label: Crown/Higher Self
positions.description: Crown - what may happen or higher perspective

positions.label: Inner Self
positions.description: Inner self - your hopes, fears, and inner thoughts

positions.label: Final Outcome
positions.description: Final outcome - where this all leads

instructions: Focus deeply on your question or situation
Draw the Present Situation card first
Place the Challenge card across it (rotated 90Â°)
Continue with the cross: Distant Past (left), Possible Outcome (right)
Complete the cross: Crown (top), Recent Past (bottom)
Draw the staff cards on the right: Your Approach, External Influences, Inner Self, Final Outcome
Optionally, draw the four timeline cards for additional insight

interpretation.overview: The Celtic Cross is the most comprehensive tarot spread, offering deep insight into past, present, and future influences on any situation.
tips: Start by understanding the cross formation in the center
The crossing card often represents internal conflicts
Pay special attention to the Final Outcome card
Look for patterns and connections across all cards
The staff cards (right side) show the progression of energy
Timeline cards can reveal hidden influences and timing
Take time to synthesize all cards into a coherent story
This spread works best for complex situations requiring deep insight
